attributes.action: Stop the rejection of perfectly good petitions on the grounds of overlap when no such similar petitions exist.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have seen countless excellent petitions in the rejected pile. I put it to the moderators that they are using the excuse of repetition to exclude the more constravertial petitions and are so damaging the democratic process.

rejection.details: Please send feedback on the website and e-Petitions to admin@number10.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
